languages.text: "Я понимаю, что вы и сами в тяжелом положении, но мой экипаж понес серьезные потери. Мне необходимо восполнить их".
"I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, что вы и сами в тяжелом положении, но мой экипаж понес серьезные потери. Мне необходимо восполнить их".

traits.locale_text: "I realise you are yourselves in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replenish it."
"I realise you are yourselves in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replenish it."
"I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replenish it."
"I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replenish it."
"I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."
"I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

languages.text: "Mir ist klar, dass Ihr Euch in einer schwierigen Situation befindet, doch meine Crew hat schwere Verluste erlitten. Ich muss meine verlorenen Crewmitglieder ersetzen."
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist klar, dass Ihr Euch in einer schwierigen Situation befindet, doch meine Crew hat schwere Verluste erlitten. Ich muss sie wieder auffüllen."

languages.text: « Je réalise que vous vous trouvez vous-même dans une situation délicate, mais mon équipage a subi de lourdes pertes et il faut bien que je remplace les hommes qui manquent à l'appel. »
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: « Je réalise que vous vous trouvez vous-même dans une situation délicate, mais mon équipage a subi de lourdes pertes. Je dois le reconstituer. »

languages.text: “我明白你们这边处境很困难，但我的船员死伤惨重，我必须补充新的船员。”
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: “我明白你们这边处境很困难，但我的船员死伤惨重，我必须补充新的船员。”

languages.text: 「そちらが難しい状況なのは重々承知しているが、{mf|俺|私}のクルーは大きな損害を被った。代わりの人員を補充しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: 「そちらが難しい状況なのは重々承知しているが、{mf|俺|私}のクルーは大きな損害を被った。代わりの人員を補充しなければならない」

languages.text: «Me doy cuenta de que están en una situación difícil, pero mi tripulación ha sufrido grandes pérdidas que debo remediar».
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: «Me doy cuenta de están en una situación difícil, pero mi tripulación ha sufrido grandes pérdidas. Debo remediarlo».

languages.text: "Sizlerin de zor durumda olduğunuzun farkındayım ama mürettebatım ağır kayıplar verdi. Kaybettiğim tayfamın yerine geçecek birilerini bulmalıyım."
languages.original_text: "I realise that you yourselves are in a difficult situation, but my crew has sustained heavy losses. I must replace my missing crew members."

traits.locale_text: "Sizlerin de zor durumda olduğunuzun farkındayım ama mürettebatım ağır kayıplar verdi. Kaybettiğim tayfamın yerine geçecek birilerini bulmalıyım."
